MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the TD12 postcode area of Cornhill On Tweed is still ongoing. This is due to onsite difficulties and we now expect power to be back on by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.53pm on Monday 15th March 2021.
